The Anonomi Postbox helps you to stay in touch with your contacts and synchronizes your messages to Anonomi.
Install the Anonomi Postbox app on a spare phone or tablet and leave it connected to power and WiFi.

When your Anonomi Postbox is online, your contacts can leave messages for you even if your Anonomi is offline. The Anonomi Postbox will receive the messages, and forward them to Anonomi when you come online.
Messages going through the Anonomi Postbox are encrypted and cannot be read by the Anonomi Postbox or this phone. The Anonomi Postbox simply forwards them to your Anonomi Messenger phone.

When you stop your Anonomi Postbox, the app will shut down and it will stop receiving messages until you open the app again.\n\nAny messages that have already been received will be saved. Anonomi will be able to collect them when you reopen the Anonomi Postbox app.
